data.title: Silly season thread
data.meta_description:
In Swedish hockey manner.

Next season start in six and seven months first hockey games of the seasons. The transfer market opens April-May-June-July...
data.meta_site_name: HFBoards - NHL Message Board and Forum for National Hockey League
data.text:
In Swedish hockey manner.

Next season start in six and seven months first hockey games of the seasons. The transfer market opens April-May-June-July. Linköping will not let go of the top scorer Rattie Linköping will sign uninteresting hockey players spiced up with some level hockey players Linköping will tangle between 6-12 placement once the gold team Luleå is releasing Pasic to Leksand or similar.

I don't know how Luleå's table position but Luleå nothing in the SM gold to pick up SM gold even though Silly has not started still, I will rank Luleå low in the SHL table next time.

Frölunda needs the Finn Innala to stay do you think what I think Frölunda brings in a strong physical defenseman from Switzerland and a triple of good scorers to reach the quarter-final places in the top six.

Brynäs, Djurgården, AIK or similar conceivable from Allsvenskan a new team up to SHL in 2024. Brynäs or AIK is the expectation 2024. Västerås, Tingsryd and Djurgården expected top teams 24-25 in Allsvenskan.

Autumn 2024 start the new Swedish hockey season. SHL, Allsvenskan, Hockeyettan, Hockeytvåan, Hockeytrean maybe Hockeyfyran and junior hockey and more young hockey leagues.

With MIF its same as ever, cant keep star foreigners. Pajaniemi and Kuokkanen are major losses. Time for Lassen to leave. I also want Sjöberg, Sundberg, Sallinen, Viitasalo and Alvarez gone.

Joona Ikonen, Petter Vestheim and Lassi Thomson is rumored in.

Hopefully we can get Brandsegg Nygård and Steen aswell. They would get much ice time here. Then lure Solberg here.

Marmelind

Werner

Kivihalme - Thompson

Galvas - Solberg

Ollas Mattsson - Ryan

Ivarsson - Badinka

Wahlberg - Händemark - Ikonen

Steen - Vesterheim - Brandseeg Nygård

Persson - Quine - Rosdahl

Olofsson - Forsberg - Paulsen

Olli Jokinen to Timrå, I think this had been rumoured for 6 months.

Probably his NHL audition.

If he wants to go to the NHL then the AHL or the Canadian junior leagues is the way to go, not the SHL.

If he wants to go to the NHL then the AHL or the Canadian junior leagues is the way to go, not the SHL.

No European top leagues coach will go to the jrs to coach kids. And you won't get a lick on an AHL team if you've coached liiga.

No European top leagues coach will go to the jrs to coach kids. And you won't get a lick on an AHL team if you've coached liiga.

That's the thing innit?

NHL teams only want coaches from those places, meanwhile coaches in Europe don't want to coach at those places.

Frölunda have a lot of players on contract for next year already. Rumored to join in italic.

Lars Johansson

Tobias Normann

Henrik Tömmernes - Dominik Egli

Filip Hasa - Tom Nilsson

Linus Högberg - Christian Folin

Isac Heens - Albin Sundin

Filip Cederqvist - David Edstrom - Malte Strömwall

Jere Innala - Gustav Rydahl - Max Friberg

Otto Stenberg - Nicklas Lasu - Wiktor Nilsson

Linus Nässén - Noah Hasa - Linus Öberg

Isac Born - Carl Klingberg

Noah Dower Nilsson

Good goaltending, high level defence and a lack of skill up front. As always.

Leaving: Frans Tuohimaa, Pontus Johansson (Skellefteå), Erik Borg (Ilves), Jayden Halbgewachs, Mats Rosseli Olsen, Mikael Ruohomaa, Erik Thorell. Possibly Malte Strömwall as well.

Klingberg have been a big disappointment. I wonder if Anton Blidh wanna come home. That would be a good add.

Klingberg have been a big disappointment. I wonder if Anton Blidh wanna come home. That would be a good add.

Points wise he's what I expected, but he's way softer than I anticipated. Blidh has another year with the Rangers and he would just be more of the same of what we've already got. A Lasu on the wing.
